attributes.action: Arrange for a change from the "GB" plate identifying UK vehicles to "UK" so that people in Northern Ireland feel included.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Great Britain (GB) applies only to the largest of the British Isles consisting of Wales, Scotland and England. Northern Ireland is also part of the UK but not of GB so is technically not represented by the "GB" plate that vehicles from Northern Ireland must legally show abroad. It is time that this anomaly was changed so that vehicle owners from all parts of the UK are represented and included in this identification system.
